local_intent: Move above red_plate, align, place white_plate using place_pose, release gripper, and retreat to safe distance.
assumptions: place_pose produced by prior ComputeGraspPose is available on the blackboard
white_plate is currently held in the gripper (grasp succeeded)
coherence_with_global: Consistent with GLOBAL_BT: uses the computed place_pose and current gripper state to execute MoveAbove → align → PlaceAt → OpenGripper → Retreat, matching the described transfer phase and timeouts.
